Package cvut.fel.cz.pjv.model

Class Person

java.lang.Object
cvut.fel.cz.pjv.model.Person
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Person extends Object implements Runnable
Represents a person in a simulation. The person can move within a pane, change it's state and interact with other persons.

  • Constructor Details

    • Person

      public Person(javafx.scene.layout.Pane pane, State state)
      Constructs a new Person object.
      Parameters:
      pane - The JavaFX pane.
      state - The state of the person.

  • Method Details

    • startThread

      public void startThread()
      Starts the person's thread. If the thread is not already running, a new thread is created and started.

    • stopThread

      public void stopThread()
      Stops the person's thread. If the thread is running, it is stopped and the threadLock is notified.

    • createThread

      public void createThread()
      Creates a new thread for the person.

    • run

      public void run()
      The main behavior of the person. The person moving and sometimes stays at one place. The moving continues until the person's state changes to DEAD or the thread is stopped.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • draw

      public void draw()
      Draws the person on the pane. This method should be called whenever the person's position or state changes.

    • move

      public void move()
      Moves the person to a new position.

    • collisionCheck

      public void collisionCheck(Person otherPerson)
      Checks for collision with another person and updates their states.
      Parameters:
      otherPerson - The other person to check collision with.

    • recover

      public void recover(Person person)
      Handles the recovery of a sick person. If the person has been sick for a certain duration, they change their state to RECOVERED. The speed of the given person is increased by 1.
      Parameters:
      person - The person to check recovery status.

    • dieChance

      public void dieChance()
      Handles the chance of a person dying. If the person is sick, they have a 0.03% chance of dying. The person's state is changed to DEAD and their direction is set to 0.

    • getState

      public State getState()
      Returns:
      The state of the person.

    • getSpeed

      public int getSpeed()
      Returns:
      The person's speed.

    • getPosition

      public Position getPosition()
      Returns:
      The position of the person.

    • getDirection

      public MovingPosition getDirection()
      Returns:
      The direction of the person.

    • setSpeed

      public void setSpeed(int speed)
      Parameters:
      speed - The new speed of the person.

    • setState

      public void setState(State state)
      Parameters:
      state - The new state of the person.

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition(Position position)
      Parameters:
      position - The new position of the person.
